languages.text: "Уж не смеешь ли ты обвинять меня в ереси? Нет, ты сам{mf||а} возгордил{mf|ся|ась}, считая, что {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}твоя прежняя жизнь{/d} важнее нынешних деяний! Прячься за пыльными томами, я же покажу тебе истинное правосудие".

"You have the gall to accuse me of heresy? No, you are the one indulging your hubris by thinking that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your former life{/d} outweighs the deeds of your present! Hide behind your dusty tomes all you want — I will show you true justice."
languages.original_text: "Уж не смеешь ли ты обвинять меня в ереси? Нет, ты сам{mf||а} возгордил{mf|ся|ась}, считая, что {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}твоя прежняя жизнь{/d} важнее нынешних деяний! Прячься за пыльными томами, я же покажу тебе истинное правосудие".

languages.text: « Vous avez le toupet de m'accuser d'hérésie ? C'est vous qui cédez à l'orgueil en pensant que votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}ancienne vie{/d} éclipse les erreurs de votre présent ! Cachez-vous derrière vos livres poussiéreux si vous le souhaitez, mais je compte bien vous donner un aperçu de la véritable justice. »
languages.original_text: "You have the gall to accuse me of heresy? No, you are the one indulging your hubris by thinking that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your former life{/d} outweighs the deeds of your present! Hide behind your dusty tomes all you want — I will show you true justice."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez le toupet de m'accuser d'hérésie ? C'est vous qui cédez à l'orgueil en pensant que votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}ancienne vie{/d} éclipse les erreurs de votre présent ! Cachez-vous derrière vos livres poussiéreux si vous le souhaitez, mais je compte bien vous donner un aperçu de la véritable justice. »

languages.text: 「この私を異端だと告発するとは、厚かましいにも程があるな？異端に溺れているのはお前の方だ。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}かつての経歴{/d}が、今この瞬間の所業より重いと信じているその傲慢さこそがな。古びた書物の陰にいくら隠れようと構わない。私が真の正義を見せてあげる」
languages.original_text: "You have the gall to accuse me of heresy? No, you are the one indulging your hubris by thinking that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your former life{/d} outweighs the deeds of your present! Hide behind your dusty tomes all you want — I will show you true justice."

traits.locale_text: 「この私を異端だと告発するとは、厚かましいにも程があるな？異端に溺れているのはお前の方だ。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}かつての経歴{/d}が、今この瞬間の所業より重いと信じているその傲慢さこそがな。古びた書物の陰にいくら隠れようと構わない。私が真の正義を見せてあげる」

languages.text: "Beni kâfirlikte suçlamaya cüret mi ediyorsun? Hayır, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}eski yaşantında yaşadıklarının{/d} şu ankinde yaptıklarından daha ağır bastığını düşünerek kibrine kapılan sensin asıl! İstediğin kadar tozlu kitap sayfalarının ardına saklan, sana gerçek adaleti göstereceğim!"
languages.original_text: "You have the gall to accuse me of heresy? No, you are the one indulging your hubris by thinking that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your former life{/d} outweighs the deeds of your present! Hide behind your dusty tomes all you want — I will show you true justice."

traits.locale_text: "Beni kâfirlikte suçlamaya cüret mi ediyorsun? Hayır, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}eski yaşantında yaşadıklarının{/d} şu ankinde yaptıklarından daha ağır bastığını düşünerek kibrine kapılan sensin asıl! İstediğin kadar tozlu kitap sayfalarının ardına saklan, sana gerçek adaleti göstereceğim!"

languages.text: «¿Se atreve a acusarme de herejía? No, ¡es usted quien sucumbe a la arrogancia al pensar que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}su vida anterior{/d} compensa sus acciones actuales! Ocúltese cuanto quiera tras esos tomos polvorientos, le enseñaré lo que es la verdadera justicia».
languages.original_text: "You have the gall to accuse me of heresy? No, you are the one indulging your hubris by thinking that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your former life{/d} outweighs the deeds of your present! Hide behind your dusty tomes all you want — I will show you true justice."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se atreve a acusarme de herejía? No, ¡es usted quien sucumbe a la arrogancia al pensar que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}su vida anterior{/d} compensa sus acciones actuales! Ocúltese cuanto quiera tras esos tomos polvorientos, le enseñaré lo que es la verdadera justicia».

languages.text: “你竟敢说我是异端？不，狂妄自大的人是你，你以为你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}过去的经历{/d}比你此刻的所作所为更加重要！你还是躲在你那些落满灰的大部头法典后面吧，我会让你看到何为真正的正义。”
languages.original_text: "You have the gall to accuse me of heresy? No, you are the one indulging your hubris by thinking that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your former life{/d} outweighs the deeds of your present! Hide behind your dusty tomes all you want — I will show you true justice."

traits.locale_text: “你竟敢说我是异端？不，狂妄自大的人是你，你以为你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}过去的经历{/d}比你此刻的所作所为更加重要！你还是躲在你那些落满灰的大部头法典后面吧，我会让你看到何为真正的正义。”

languages.text: "Ihr wagt es, mich der Ketzerei zu bezichtigen? Nein, Ihr nährt Eure Hybris, wenn Ihr denkt, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Euer früheres Leben{/d} kompensiert Eure heutigen Taten! Verschanzt Euch nur hinter Euren verstaubten Folianten ... ich werde Euch wahre Gerechtigkeit zeigen."
languages.original_text: "You have the gall to accuse me of heresy? No, you are the one indulging your hubris by thinking that {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}your former life{/d} outweighs the deeds of your present! Hide behind your dusty tomes all you want — I will show you true justice."
